item.title: Markdown Reference Guide
item.description: Markdown Reference Guide I am a paragraph in markdown with line wrapping so fit in this width. I am a continuation of the first paragraph as there is no empty line before me. I am in the second paragraph. I am the third one. Even though there are two line breaks before me, this does not create any newline characters. After me there are two spaces before the newline character.
